item.title: Healing the freezing of Jiayu G2F phone
item.description: I ordered a Jiayu G2F WCDMA phone with 1Gb RAM and 4Gb ROM at Aliexpress. The phone is pretty cool but it has a very disappointing problem - it freezes very often without any visible reason. Searching on the web revealed that this problem pertains to the whole model and not exclusively to my device. I purchased the phone for my daughter and she liked it very much, so we didn’t want sending it back to seller.
